sect2.title: Introduction to Berkeley DB-&db-3.3-version;
sect2.para: The Berkeley DB package contains version &db-3.3-version; of the Berkeley Database.

sect2.title: Installation of Berkeley DB
sect2.para: Install Berkeley DB by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np0 -i ../patch.&db-3.3-version;.1 && patch -Np0 -i ../patch.&db-3.3-version;.2 && cd build_unix && ../dist/configure --prefix=/opt/db-3.3 --enable-compat185 && make && make docdir=/opt/db-3.3/doc/Berkeley-DB install && cd /opt/db-3.3/lib/ && mv libdb.so .. && for i in $(ls); do mv $i /usr/lib; ln -sf /usr/lib/$i; done && mv ../libdb.so . && cd /opt/db-3.3/include/ && sed -i 's/^DB185/DB/' db_185.h && ln -nsf /opt/db-3.3/include /usr/include/db3

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: docdir=/opt/db-3.3/doc/Berkeley-DB: Installs the documentation in the /opt/db-3.3 hierarchy.
mv libdb.so .. and mv ../libdb.so .: Avoids moving libdb.so to /usr/lib.
for i in ...; do ...; ln ...; done: Moves the DB libraries to /usr/lib and creates symlinks to these libraries in /opt/db-3.3/lib.
sed -i 's/^DB185/DB/' db_185.h: Change the DB185 database pointer to DB.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Berkeley DB package contains db_archive, db_checkpoint, db_deadlock, db_dump, db_load, db_printlog, db_recover, db_stat, db_upgrade, db_verify and the libdb-3 libraries.

sect3.title: db_archive
sect3.para: db_archive prints the pathnames of log files that are no longer in use.

sect3.title: db_checkpoint
sect3.para: db_checkpoint is a daemon process used to monitor and checkpoint database logs.

sect3.title: db_deadlock
sect3.para: db_deadlock is used to abort lock requests when deadlocks are detected.

sect3.title: db_dump
sect3.para: db_dump converts database files to a flat file format readable by db_load.

sect3.title: db_load
sect3.para: db_load is used to create database files from flat files created with db_dump.

sect3.title: db_printlog
sect3.para: db_printlog converts database log files to human readable text.

sect3.title: db_recover
sect3.para: db_recover is used to restore a database to a consistent state after a failure.

sect3.title: db_upgrade
sect3.para: db_upgrade is used to upgrade database files to a newer version of Berkeley DB.

sect3.title: db_verify
sect3.para: db_verify is used to run consistency checks on database files.
